      • findArticlesByQuery

        @Query("SELECT a FROM ArticleEntity a WHERE a.published = true AND ( LOWER(a.tags) LIKE LOWER(concat(\'%\', :query, \'%\')) OR LOWER(a.category) LIKE LOWER(concat(\'%\', :query, \'%\')) OR LOWER(a.title) LIKE LOWER(concat(\'%\', :query, \'%\')) OR LOWER(a.contents) LIKE LOWER(concat(\'%\', :query, \'%\')) )")
java.util.List<ArticleEntity> findArticlesByQuery​(@Param("query")
                                                  java.lang.String query,
                                                  org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)

      • findAllArticlesByQuery
